name: High School Party Craft: Story
description:
Girls Craft Party at High School! Love and romance! Party hard and make new friends! Find a perfect boy or a perfect girlfriend! Building & crafting games for free! Make the greatest party ever. Invite friends from school! Great game for teens and adults! Hire a DJ! Chat with boys and girls (real chat!) Date people! Fall in love! Pool party in a cube world! Block party! Have fun, drink, dance (yes, you can have a REAL DJ turntables and play music!) Best party simulator game ever! Dating game! Party games free! Pool, beautiful girls! Fashion craft & design. Create own love story at the best party ever! My sweet sixteen is nothing when you compare to your party! Epic party in Dorm! Sexy girls, handsome boys! Dancing and having fun! Dress-up game in sandbox world! Best games for teenage girls and boys! Prepare perfect make-up and get dressed with the nicest clothes to pick up the boy of your dreams! Make your highschool crush love you! Party salon is open! Colorful drinks, pool and music! Building and crafting! Vip pool party or “invite all” - you decide! Maybe PJ Pajamas party? Or crazy beach party? Whatever you want! Prepare the disco using blocks.
FEATURES:
Real CHAT
Beach party mode
Pool party mode
VIP party mode
Dorm party mode
Building and crafting items (crafting table)
Sandbox world
Boys and girls on your party

UPCOMING FEATURES:
Multiplayer
Become a rock star!
developers: Crafting And Building Games For Girls Adventure
